data.question: What process leads to the formation of a neutron star?
data.answer: The gravitational collapse of a massive star’s core
arr: The gravitational collapse of a massive star’s core
The fusion of carbon into heavier elements

The collapse of a white dwarf

data.question: Why can a black hole form from the remnants of a massive star?
data.answer: Its gravity surpasses the escape velocity of light
arr: Its mass exceeds the Chandrasekhar Limit
Its gravity surpasses the escape velocity of light

data.answer: Pulsars emit regular pulses of radiation
